tool_description: Generates detailed cost breakdowns for wood purchasing including materials, taxes, delivery, and optional processing fees.

species_quantities.description: Quantities in board feet for each species

species_names.description: Wood species names corresponding to quantities

unit_prices.description: Price per board foot for each species

tax_rate.description: Local sales tax rate as percentage (0-15%)

bulk_discount.description: Bulk discount percentage for large orders (0-25%)

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: species_quantities, species_names, and unit_prices must have the same length
Invalid tax rate: Must be between 0 and 15 percent
Invalid quantities: All quantities must be positive numbers
Invalid unit prices: All prices must be positive numbers
Invalid delivery cost: Must be a non-negative number
Invalid bulk discount: Must be between 0 and 25 percent
Too many species: Limit to 10 species maximum per cost breakdown
usage: Provide matching arrays of species names, quantities, and unit prices. Include tax rate and optionally add delivery costs, processing fees, and bulk discounts.

subtotal.description: Total cost before taxes and fees

total_fees.description: Sum of delivery and processing fees

final_total.description: Final total cost including all adjustments

cost_per_species.description: Individual cost for each species before taxes/fees
